Look at the 'Condition' field. If it says anything other than 'Fresh' - REJECT
Look at the 'Type' field. If it says 'Sweet Potato' - REJECT (no permits)
Look at the 'Country' field. If it says 'Chip Hill' - REJECT (banned)
Look at 'Born' field. Calculate age and check against rule
Look at the 'Gender' field and check against current rule
These rules must be enforced for ALL potatoes
Expired documents must ALWAYS be rejected.
Need help? Click on any rule for an explanation
